Review.Titre: Order always ends up being canceled
Review.Contenu: I have tried so many times to buy from their site, and every single one my orders ends up being canceled even though I'm receiving an order receipt on my email just fine. The reason for that is that their site detects an unusual activity on my end. What's unusual thought, that I don't know. I also sent an email to their support to help me on what to do but it's been weeks and I have not received any response since.A total waste of time.Edit: just spoke with them on chat. They weren't helpful at all. Said that it's because of a 3rd party security that they are using and there's nothing they can do on their end to help me. Honestly I wouldn't be surprised if all this is just a scheme to steal my card info. Lemme cancel the ones I used ASAP.

My Debit Card got hacked, I know this because the transaction. Failed due to insufficient balance.The Online security here for American Multi Logging Key Cards is very pour. I will not be using your services. I demand to know what happened an hour ago to my Key Card on this website. Have a good day.

Review.Titre: I have used this website 3 other times…
Review.Contenu: I have used this website 3 other times without any problems before. But this time I tried using my credit card and I was charged twice but did not receive credit for my order. Tried reaching out to customer service via email and chat and did not get any response from either.

Review.Titre: Scam alert don't buy anything from them.
Review.Contenu: I got debited $20 for Razer gold gift card but create an error that it wasn't successful, i chat Their CS they quickly respond that transaction is flag risky or i used VPN while it's not true.When i request a receipt for failed transaction from their end they open my message but refused to show or answer me.Be aware they will scam you if you buy from them.If you are not fraudster release my money, gift card or show me a failed receipt from your end.

Review.Titre: Doesn't Let Me Click Checkout then Charges Me
Review.Contenu: Have tried this site on TWO different occasions, months apart from each other. First time, it wouldn't even let me create an account with my email address. Second time, I manage to create the account by logging in with Google, but after inputting my credit card, it doesn't let me click "Checkout." I backout, proceed to cart, and try again. Same issue, and it shows that my cart is still filled. Next morning, I see I got charged for the digital codes on my credit card even though I NEVER GOT PAST CHECK OUT OR RECEIVED THE CODES. THE ITEM IS STILL IN MY CART SO I DO NOT KNOW HOW THE TRANSACTION EVEN WENT THROUGH. Bank even called me because it was deemed suspicious activity. I will be buying my game cards elsewhere from now on due to my bad experience with this site.

Review.Titre: Made a purchase with paypal and money…
Review.Contenu: Made a purchase with paypal and money was taken out from my debit card as I got the notification, however on the scratchmonkey site it gave an error. Paypal does not show the transaction but my bank sent me an email stating the funds were approved......... what the hell?Edit: Changed my email to my paypal email and got an error to verify myself. Was sent to submit a ticket, however when pressing submit..... it just sent me to an error page.

Ridiculous. Make 1 purchase a few weeks ago, no issue. Try make another purchase a few weeks later with the same details, same billing/payment info, same name, same email address, and NOT through VPN and they decide to mark you for fraud and the only help you get is “Make sure your billing & payment info match up, that you’re using the same email address, and not using VPN”. Useless service.

I tried to buy a code and the system generated an error during the purchase, the debit was made and the code was not sent. I tried again and the same result but this time the reverse was generated. I sent 2 emails to technical support and haven't received a response yet. I understand that it's a system error and this can be solved. I also tried to use the contact area and it was not successful. There must be an easier way to solve these types of situations that are very common. I still can't give you a better rating because you still have my money and I haven't received the product even though it's been almost 2 weeks since I tried to make the purchase.

Maybe a rip off.UPDATE: I received an update that noted this may have been marked for fraud by this vendor. I was not using a VPN, and all my information was correct, so I'm not sure how this happened. The card indicates the funds were removed, but the vendor indicates it may be in Pending status, meaning it's not in my account, not paid out, just inaccessible. I will contact the card company, but while that may return my funds, it does not get me any closer to the purchase. It's only $10, but because it's only $10, it shouldn't be this fraught to get it to work.

Review.Titre: There is a lack of info on the purchase process
Review.Contenu: What I liked about Scratchmonkeys is that I could get a variety of gift cards safely and ones that work.However, my first time was horrendous because they had left out a lot of stuff about the purchase process.If you are buying via PayPal,make sure that your sign up email is the same as the one on your PayPal email ,otherwise the transaction will fail.If you are buying using a credit or debit card, make sure you are using a home computer and on a private network,otherwise the transaction is flagged.Scratchmonkeys should have mentioned all this on their guidelines ,rather than learning them from support after several failed transactions .

Review.Titre: I would have rated 5 stars but I bought a invalid code.

Other than that a great website, fast custom we service responses and cheap prices for x box live codes.

Review.Titre: Attempted to buy a 5$ ITunes card

Next thing I know, I’ve got 3 transactions that went through showing up on my back account, and I don’t even have the gift cards yet. I really hope support gets back to me soon about this.Edit: Thank you support for the response, I understand the security concerns and such, if the money does not return to my account, I will let you know, but otherwise thanks for your help, I can’t find a reason for the issue, but I guess I’ll have to figure it out. Thanks again!

Easy to use website. Was easy to find the products that I wanted and checkout. Frustrated with what feels like a million and one emails asking to review my experience when I did it at the time of purchase.

The instantaneous delivery of a digital code is an amazing feature to have. Only reason this is a 4 star and not 5 is not because there is any flaw but space for improvement like getting a bit more banana points back for purchasing. I think I've done maybe around 15-20 purchases and made around 80 cents so. Also it would be nice/convenient if there was a longer wait period between being inactive and the site logging you out. Anyways, love scratchmonkey and will hopefully continue to purchase from here

Review.Contenu: I struggled to get my credit cards to work on the site; either being blocked by the site, or blocked by my credit company, so that was a bit frustrating. However the team (Chrys specifically) were super helpful in trying to help figure out the issues so I could finally make my purchase and then all was well :3.

ScratchMonkeys tend to charge the same as the game sites for add-ons and things but without any additional tax, they also email the codes way faster and are just a pretty good alternative. One criticism is the banana points being pretty useless though but I can get over that

Review.Titre: When it works great, when it doesn't create a new account.
Review.Contenu: When I had problems buying they were unable to be resolved. They always rejected my payment no matter what method I used. I finally gave up with support who gave me various excuses. I decided to give it one last try by creating a new account. I was magically able to buy with no issues. They get 4 stars because despite my past issues, this transaction took seconds to successfully complete.

To be honest I was skeptical at first but I did my purchase and it worked! I bought a $20 PSN Card, got the code immediately. I just redeemed it and got the funds added to my wallet. 4 Stars instead of 5 because my purchase failed the first time -my scratchmonkeys and paypal email didn’t match- and I got charged a $1 from paypal -.- It was annoying as hell. Review.Titre: Original Order Too Large to Process
Review.Contenu: Overall, a good experience; purchase was legitimate and code worked. Unfortunately, due to fraud concerns, my original order had to be modified from three items to one, and the promo for new members was wasted. Also, a minor discrepancy with order total (price for original order came to approx. $85 CAD, but showed as approx. $90 CAD on Paypal), which isn't exactly proper. I had concerns that I wouldn't get customer service on the weekend, and was surprised to see a reply back within an hour. After a couple days going back and forth, finally got a replacement coupon, but three codes at a time was still flagged (did order a single code again, and no troubles redeeming)! Will attempt to do two, but doesn't look promising that more than one code at a time will ever be permitted.
